Supreme Court Tenure Establishment and Retirement Modernization Act of 2022
To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide for the duration of active service of justices of the Supreme Court, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Supreme Court Tenure Establishment and Retirement Modernization Act of 2022
This bill sets an 18-year term limit for Supreme Court Justices.
